I am currently a Professor of Economics at the Toulouse School of Economics (TSE). Prior to my academic career, I have been an Economist at the Inter-American Development Bank in Washington DC. I can be reached at matteo.bobba@tse-fr.eu. For information about my teaching activities, including current and past courses, please check my dedicated TSE webpage. I am a Research Fellow at the CEPR (Development and Labor), IZA, and the EUDN. I am also an invited researcher at JPAL (Learning for All Initiative and Latin America Office).
